comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: US Navy ship, from Wiki: Jason was once again involved in a humanitarian gesture as she sailed from New York 14 November, bearing Christmas gifts for the Mediterranean fleet and the people of Europe.

comment._content: This is one of nine Bain Collection photos of the USS Jason "Christmas Ship" project in 1914: www.flickr.com/search/?ss=2&w=8623220@N02&q=chris...
